editor.input:
x = tf.constant([4, 12, 8, 8])
new_x = tf.squeeze(
  tf.nn.conv1d(
    tf.reshape(x, [1, int(x.shape[0]), 1]),
    tf.constant([[[1]], [[1]], [[1]]]),
    1,
    'VALID'
  )
)
print(new_x)

completion.answer:
x = tf.constant([5, 2, 20, 15, 32, 100])
new_x = tf.where(
  tf.boolean_mask(x, x % 5 == 0) % 2 == 1,
  tf.square(tf.boolean_mask(x, x % 5 == 0)),
  tf.boolean_mask(x, x % 5 == 0)
)
print(new_x)
